articles.title: 'Fauda' actor seriously injured while fighting against Hamas in Israel - Moneycontrol
articles.description: An Israeli diplomat shared the news about Amedi on X and wrote, “Idan Amedi, one of Fauda's actors, has been seriously injured in a battle in Gaza. We pray and pray for your speedy recovery."
articles.content: Idan Amedi, an Israeli singer-songwriter, popular for his role in Netflix show Fauda was seriously injured while fighting as an Israel Defence Forces (IDF) reservist against the Hamas in Gaza. He was… [+1717 chars]
